tool.name: SAGA.grid_tools.7
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayINPUT False isArrayMASK False output_data_RESULT $output_data_RESULT name SAGA.grid_tools.7 INPUT $INPUT MASK $MASK THRESHOLD $THRESHOLD prefer $prefer response $response outputType_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.outputType_RESULT transmissionMode_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.transmissionMode_RESULT

param.name: INPUT
param.label: Grid
param.help: Grid The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, png, tiff

param.name: MASK
param.label: Mask
param.help: Mask The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, png, tiff

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_RESULT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: Close gaps of a grid data set (i.e. eliminate no data values). If the target is not set, the changes will be stored to the original grid.
